package.name: shadow
package.build: cd ${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION} jobcount=2 if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then DISTCC_HOSTS="$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" export DISTCC_HOSTS jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` export CC="distcc gcc" export CXX="distcc g++" fi ./configure --sysconfdir=/etc --with-group-name-max-length=32 && make -j $jobcount
